casebody.data:
*Joseph Elsas, plaintiff in error, vs. J. B. Moore, defendant in error. *606John H. Walker et al., plaintiffs in error, vs. James A. Miller, administrator, et al., defendants in error. Noble Brothers & Company, plaintiffs in error, vs. P. H. . Loud, defendant in error. The Georgia Railroad and Banking ¿Company, plaintiff in error, vs. John M. Zachry, defendant in error. Jerry Ueeord, plaintiff in error, vs. The State of Georgia, defendant in error. Monroe Hampton, plaintiff in error, vs. The State of Georgia, defendant in error.

[*No reports or opinions are published in this and the following Gases, in accordance with the provisions of act of March 2d, 1875,] (R.)

The discretion of the court below, exercised in granting or refusing a new trial, will not be controlled unless manifestly abused.
